notes.note:
The [Event Timing API][1] is now supported.


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/PerformanceEventTiming

The CSS f[orced-colors media query][1] is now supported.


  [1]: https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/CSS/@media/forced-colors

text:
We'd like to extend a special thank you to [all of the new Mozillians][0] who contributed to this release of Firefox!

[0]: https://blog.mozilla.org/community/
title: Firefox for Android 89.0 Release
